Desde ayer intento entrar en www.google.com y me salta el error No se ha conectado: Posible problema de seguridad, al pinchar en avanzado, solo me deja ver el certificado, no hay ninguna otra opción.

title: Text can no longer be read after Firefox update - too bright
content:
Hello

After the latest Firefox update, 101.0 (64-Bit) for Windows, the text of our website can't be read anymore because it suddenly appears way too bright.

It worked since years before and still works with other browsers.

Is this a know bug with version 101 and might be fixed? Or is there any other problem?

The website is: link text

Thanks a lot, if someone can help!

Kind regards,

Wolfgang
creator: public66

title: Pérdida de configuración
content: Buenos días: Uso Firefox en MacOs, y está todo actualizado. Una vez a la semana Firefox olvida mis ajustes personalizados, como la página de inicio o el buscador. ¿Qué puedo hacer al respecto? Gracias
creator: noeliajm

title: Problemi coi FONT sottili, illegibili dopo l'aggiornamento
content:
Buongiorno ho un problema piuttosto grande che si è verificato dopo l'ultimo aggiornamento automatico alla versione 101.0 (64bit) di Firefox. Sostanzialmente vedo (alcuni) font sottili, illegibili, come se fossero semi trasparenti... ma questo non succede con tutti i fonti ma solo con alcuni (tipo il Raleway). La cosa strana è che questo capita solo su Firefox mentre su Chrome vedo i font correttamente, e solo dopo l'ultimo update del browser. Ho anche provato ad avviare la modalità safe SENZA estensioni ma ho lo stesso problema. Come posso risolvere, dato che lo uso per leggere e lavorare?

Allego 2 img di come lo vedo su FF e su Chrome, ad es.

Grazie grazie a chi saprà aiutarmi!
creator: tuttomika

title: My Firefox Browser suddenly changed my text font to thinner one on almost every page. How can I change it back to normal.
content: My text font on my FireFox Browser just went from normal bold text that was visible, to thin grayish barely visible text, on almost every page I open. How can i get my text font back to normal? Settings are on default.

title: my Router page, times out can't log-in no problems connecting to the Internet’ in ‘Firefox’
content: I have been trying to log on to my router page for months! I was able to log-on once only. I have tried everything, with no luck. It seem as though Firefox is using AI within the browser for certain things... Why isn't there a better way to log-in to the Browser Page for using your router? it should not be so complicate being that many people use them.

title: Error: 410 Gone
content: When browsing the BBC Sport website (using a VPN) and clicking on a link, I often get the error code mentioned in the subject (see attachment). If I try to follow the same link on other browsers (Edge, Chrome) the link is displayed without problem. The issue goes away if the VPN is disconnected. Why is it only Firefox that has this issue and is there a solution? (apart from not using the VPN)
creator: Kashegan01

title: Screen share on google meet
content: I use google meet a lot. I need to screen my screen very often. i have used other web browsers which let to share a singe tab in the meet, but in firefox, can only get the option for either a window or an entire screen which is very inconvenient. I hope to hear from you soon because i use firefox and its be a shame for me to switch to other web browsers completely for this issue. My email is vijay.rh@gmail.com
creator: vijay.rh

title: javascript functon sometimes not working.
content:
I have a little javascript was given to me that increases the volume when playing Youtube vids that are too quiet. here it is: javascript:(function(){var videoElement = document.querySelector("video");var audioCtx = new AudioContext();var source = audioCtx.createMediaElementSource(videoElement);var gainNode = audioCtx.createGain();gainNode.gain.value = 3; /* triple the volume */ source.connect(gainNode);gainNode.connect(audioCtx.destination);})();

I don't know how it works. Whether it talks to firefox or it talks to win10 or it talks to Youtube. I don't know.

But sometimes it doesn't work. then I have to reboot.

Seeing it is in Firefox I just thought firefox guys might know something about why it doesn't work and perhaps some way to kick it into action?
creator: abrogard

creator: glojkoz

title: Can't open Firefox
content:
Long time user -- Firefox is default browser. 2 PCs (Windows 10 non network, same router) -- Upstairs is OK/normal,no issues (using now,) downstairs can't access WEB. "Open" Firefox, get blank page ("new tab.") No home page, settings, nothing. PC shows connected to Internet. Router shows usual lights. Microsoft Edge works. Downloaded newest FFX, no change. Rebooted, no change. Refresh, no change. Can't Uninstall and reinstall - "Refresh-Close" loop. Was fine yesterday. Stormy today, no power issues (UPS/Surge.) All other programs/files seem fine.

Help ???????

Thanks, Dave Mac
creator: davemac013

title: Rayita de escritura aparece en todas las páginas
content: Hola chicos, espero estén bien. No sé cómo explicar esto pero sé que me pueden ayudar. Resulta que estoy en una página normal y no importa si hay o no un cuadro donde escribir me aparece el cursor o rayita de escritura titilando sobre alguna palabra, sé que es un error minúsculo pero cuando estoy en Netlfix o en Youtube con pantalla completa sigue apareciendo la rayita de escritura en una esquina, siento que es un bug o algo parecido. Alguien sabe qué puede ser? Les agradezco mucho.
creator: cceronh

title: How to keep firefox from overwriting a certain window?
content: I have a small window where I keep track of ball game score. Unfortunately, as I keep browsing, Firefox overwrites that window with new content. Is there a way to tell Firefox to leave that window alone?

title: closing tabs but task manager still has them open
content:
I will open a few tabs, then close some then open more , then everything slows down, I go to task manager and see that many tasks are still open under Firefox

I want tabs to close ( end process) when I close them

So now I manually 'end process' and the machine resumes speed

How do I get firefox to End Process when tabs are closed

this is w 8.1, don't know what version of firefox, pretty recent

this is firefox mozilla, as best I understand, not that I know why these two are always paired

tx

title: Firefox 101.0 - YouTube looks different after login to youtube account - Design problem - Windows 10
content: Hi dear managers, First of all please delete this duplicate question because of mistake about links : Admin please Delete this... In Windows 10 & Firefox 101.0 youtube is like below before login to youtube account : Before Login After login to my account in youtube it looks like this : After Login I checked it with another account - same problem. My windows os is totally new and updated yesterday. FF is new and i cleared it's data from History menu. In previous windows 7 i had same issue. Why youtube acts like that and what is this design problem and how can i fox it? Here is another example : Before Login After Login

content:
Hi dear managers, In Firefox 101.0 i want to clear Saved Passwords from History Menu > Clear Recent History! But in new version of FF it is not there. Is there a way to clear Saved Passwords from that menu instead of Saved Logins... In Settings of FF separately?

Thanks for future advance
creator: helius.dev

title: Mendeley Web Extension blocked on PDFs
content:
Hi,

I use Mendeley Web Extension to pull articles and other things from Firefox directly into my Mendeley library. I will usually rapidly read through the PDF file online before deciding to add it or not. For some unknown reason, Firefox blocks the use of Mendeley on PDF file, for security reasons, and I can no longer add them to my library. Most references are only available as PDF files making the add-on completely useless. Is there a security feature that I can disable to be able to use the extension again?

Kind regards,

Mathias
creator: mathias.rsl

title: Email masking extension
content:
I had to remove the email mask extension before I had any opportunity to use it. It would often pop up at inappropriate places that had nothing to do with email, and often blocked me from inputting text in things I was filling out online. Once it pops up, you can't move it out of the way. Thanks.

BTW, had to do a lot of searching just to make a comment.
creator: mjk3310

title: Recent Update
content: 7.9.32.2 Roboform worked with Firefox 100.0 but after 101.0 update Roboform has been disable. I PAID for this add-on.
creator: dozier

title: Areas of info fade out in a program app I've been using for over two years; seems to be just since the last firefox update
content:
As described above I'm now seeing section descriptions in a program app I've been using in my work successfully over the past two years. Now, all of a sudden, the section titles in the program are faded gray almost to white, which makes entering info (not to mention eye strain), really difficult. Just wondering if this might have been something that occurred with the last Firefox update.

I've tried adjusting the screen resolution but it makes no difference. See the screenshot with this message.

cwr@sti.net
creator: cwr34
